title: Fawad prays for early recovery of Fauzia Saeed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 05 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Monday prayed for early recovery of Dr Fauzia Saeed.
In a tweet, the minister said that his prayers and thoughts were with Fauzia Saeed who was an asset for Pakistan.
Prayers and thoughts with #FauziaSaeed she is an asset for Pakistan may Allah grant her early recovery
â€” Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) July 5, 2021
